extends BaseMembershipField
    A representation of an attribute consisting of Groups.

    • Method Detail

      • getAttribute

        public edu.internet2.middleware.shibboleth.common.attribute.BaseAttribute<Group> getAttribute(Member member)
        Get the resultant attribute whose values are the Groups that the given Member belongs to.
        Parameters:
        member - the member
        Returns:
        the attribute consisting of groups or null if the member does not belong to any groups

      • getAttribute

        public edu.internet2.middleware.shibboleth.common.attribute.BaseAttribute<Group> getAttribute(Member member,
                                                                                     Filter filter)
        Get the resultant attribute whose values are the Groups that the given Member belongs to. If the Filter is not null, then only the groups which match the filter are returned.
        Parameters:
        member - the member
        filter - the filter
        Returns:
        the attribute consisting of groups or null if the member does not belong to any groups
